headline: Jamie Dimon Warns of Market "Crack." These 3 Stocks May Offer Shelter.
summary: Countercyclical stocks like Dollar General and AutoZone should do well amid economic pressure.  Jami Dimon is one of the most respected minds on Wall Street.  The JPMorgan Chase (NYSE: JPM) CEO not only leads the biggest bank in the country by assets but also famously led his bank though the 2008 financial crisis and did not need to be rescued by the government, though it did participate in the Troubled Asset Relief Program (TARP).
